MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-NOV-2020 02:45.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH65 postcode area of Ellesmere Port, affecting properties in Whitby Road, Cambridge Road and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.45PM due to a fault on the underground cable network and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to carrying out repairs on Cambridge Road affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:49am on 7th November
